description: This file defines React components and types for rendering customizable charts using the Recharts library. It includes context management, styling, tooltip, legend, and configuration handling for chart components.

methods.name: useChart
methods.description: Custom hook to access the chart context, throws an error if used outside a ChartContainer.

methods.name: getPayloadConfigFromPayload
methods.description: Helper function to extract configuration for a payload item from the chart config.
